name: SnowFall (Dr.Pro.27)
description:
A Fun little Plattformer-game where you have to fight against snowmen

At the start of the game, you are a little snowball. By collecting snowflakes, you get bigger. Every time a snowman does touch you, you get smaller. If you are small and a snowman hit's you, you die. Try to fight as many snowmen as possible to get the highest score possible.

Thanks to my friend ReptilianAlien.

We made this game together for the  Black and White Jam #⁷√∞ using Unity.
